fit(trainX, trainY, n_epochs=None, fname=None, verbose=False)[source]¶

Train module for LSTM network

Parameters:
  • trainX (ndarray) – training data, features
  • trainY (ndarray) – training data, targets
  • n_epochs (int) – number of training epochs
  • fname (str) – filename for saving model parameters
  • verbose (bool) – if True, outputs loss values while training
Returns:

None

  • pred_len (int) – number of predicted values (target dimensionality)
